naslov: Kaštela - Luksuzni apartman u novo renoviranoj kamenoj kući - 50m od m (prodaja)
opis: Molimo zvati na broj mob: +385 98 195 34 63. Hvala. U povjesnom centru Kaštel Starog svega 50m od uređene plaže, u neposrednoj blizini nove marine, realiziran je ovaj jedinstveni, 2-etažni apartman, smješten unutar upravo renovirane kamene kuće, krajnje u nizu tipične kaštelanske kalete. Kaštela su odlično prometno povezana sa cijelim svijetom Na 5 - 15km od Kaštel Starog nalaze se: međunarodna zračna luka Split, željeznički kolodvor, autoput, međunarodna trajektna luka... Lokalna autobusna linija svakih 20 min. povezuje Kaštela sa Splitom i Trogirom. Renoviranje je izvedeno vrlo stručno od temelja do krova, poštujući sve konzervatorske zahtjeve, jer je kuća, stara 300 g., zaštićena kao spomenik kulture. Provedene su sve kompletno nove instalacije: struja, voda, priključak za optički internet, te podno grijenje pa se u kući može ugodno boraviti tijekom cijele godine. Stambeni prostor je organiziran u open-space stilu na dvije etaže koje su povezane ručno izrađenim stepenicama od kovanog željeza. Na donjoj etaži nalazi se kuhinja sa trpezarijom i dnevni boravak, a na katu, spavaći dio i kupatilo. Apartaman je potpuno opremljen svim potrebnim, visoko kvalitetnim aparatima i namještajem po mjeri, te je dodatno oplemenjen brojnim savršeno uklopljenim detaljima, od kojih su mnogi unikatni, ručno izrađeni. Ovaj luksuzni apartman je već plasiran na turističko tržište, te je bookiran veći dio naredne sezone. Dokumantacija uredna. Vlasništvo 1/1. Osigurana sva pravna, logistička i stručna usluga. Ostale informacije na upit. mob: +385 98 195 3463 mail: split@kvadar-nekretnine.hr www.kvadar-nekretnine.hr Hvala. ------------------------------------------------------ Kaštela - Luxury apartment in a newly renovated stone house - 50m from the sea Please call the mobile number: +385 98 195 34 63. Thank you. In the historical center of the Kastel Stari, only 50m from the beach, in the immediate vicinity of the new marina, this unique, 2-story apartment has been built, located inside a newly renovated stone house, at the end of a row of typical Kastelan small street. Kaštela is well connected to the whole world by transport. 5 - 15 km from Kaštel Stari there are: international airport Split, railway station, highway, international ferry port... Local bus line every 20 min. connects Kaštela with Split and Trogir. The renovation was carried out very professionally from the foundation to the roof, respecting all conservation requirements, because the house, which is 300 years old, is protected as a cultural monument. All completely new installations have been carried out: electricity, water, optical internet connection, and underfloor heating, so you can comfortably stay in the house all year round. The living space is organized in an open-space style on two floors that are connected by handmade wrought iron stairs. On the lower floor there is a kitchen with a dining room and a living room, and on the first floor, a bedroom and a bathroom. The apartment is fully equipped with all the necessary, high-quality appliances and custom-made furniture, and is additionally refined with numerous perfectly integrated details, many of which are unique, handmade. This luxury apartment has already been placed on the tourist market, and is booked for most of the next season. The documentation is in order. Ownership 1/1. All legal, logistical and professional services are provided. Other information on request. mobile: +385 98 195 3463 mail: split@kvadar-nekretnine.hr www.kvadar-nekretnine.hr Thank you.
